name: PulseEXE
description:
Made by Supbscripter, SuddenlyEva (https://suddenlyeva.itch.io) and lots of help from cdrch (https://cdrch.itch.io) with the theory behind the procedural generation.

Controls : WASD/Arrow Keys to move. Player and enemies auto-shoot by moving.

Blast your way through prcoedurally generated asteroids filled with enemies and try find the wormhole to send you to the next one!
